author: wn.com
title: Lynn Boylan MEP to host public hearing on Halawa case in European Parliament (Sinn Féin) ...
text: ( Source : Sinn Féin ) 17 October , 2015 - by Lynn Boylan MEP Sinn Féin MEP Lynn Boylan is to host a public hearing of the case of Ibrahim Halawa in the European Parliament in Brussels next week. Speaking ahead of the event today Ms Boylan
